info.title: Agentic AI Python Backend
info.description: Unified Python backend for Agentic AI Platform

post.description: Logout user (invalidate token on client side).
Get OAuth redirect URL for social login.
Handle OAuth callback and authenticate user.

get.description: List all tenants for current user.
List all agents for current tenant.
Get full agent configuration (public endpoint for chat widget).
List all knowledge bases for current tenant.

post.description: Upload and create a new document.

Accepts a batch of documents from URLs and initiates a background
task to process all of them. This endpoint returns immediately.
Create a document from a URL.

get.description: Get all assistant configurations (public endpoint for chat widget).
Get lead form by tenant ID.
Get user permissions grouped by module.
Get chat messages for a session.

post.description: Clear and delete a session (playground only).
Clear chat messages for a session.

get.description: Check if lead form should be shown for session.

post.description: Stream chat responses via Server-Sent Events.
Handle document status update webhook from RAG service.

get.description: Get WhatsApp configuration by phone number ID (public endpoint).
Deep health check including database and cache connectivity.
Readiness check - indicates if service is ready to accept traffic.
Liveness check - indicates if service is alive.

post.description:
Initiate key handshake - share server's AES key with client.
This enables end-to-end encryption for chat messages.

get.description:
Get server encryption info.
Returns information about the encryption type used.

post.description: Update or create agent code at the specified path.
Retrieve assistant code from the specified path.
Invoke agent code with the specified action and payload.
Request human handoff for a session.
Accept a handoff request by human agent.
Send a message as a human agent.
End human handoff and return to AI.

get.description: Get agent configuration (public endpoint for chat widget).
